already_have_account: Already have an account? Sign in
dont_have_account: Don't have an account? Sign up
account_created_check_email: Account created! Please check your emails to confirm your registration.
password_reset_email_sent: If this email address is in our database, a password reset link has been sent.
reset_password_desc: Enter your email to receive a reset link.
email_link_expired: The password reset link is invalid or has expired.
email_not_confirmed: Please confirm your email address to log in. A new confirmation link has been sent.
unexpected_login_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
confirm_logout_description: Are you sure you want to log out of your account?
mfa_description: Strengthen your account security by enabling two-factor authentication.
mfa_enabled_successfully: Two-factor authentication has been successfully enabled.
scan_qr_code: Scan this QR code with your authentication app.
or_use_secret: Or manually enter this secret key:
confirm_disable_mfa_own_account: Are you sure you want to disable two-factor authentication for your account?
confirm_disable_mfa_desc: Are you sure you want to disable MFA for user {{email}}? They will lose this additional security layer.
mfa_disabled_for_user: MFA has been disabled for user {{email}}.
allow_new_registrations_desc: Control whether new users can register on the site.
registrations_are_closed: Registrations are currently closed. Please contact an administrator.
registration_successful: Registration successful! You can now sign in.
registrations_are_closed_desc: New registrations are not allowed at this time.
contact_admin_for_access: Contact an administrator to get access.
email_not_confirmed_continue_option: Email not confirmed. You can continue or confirm your email.
email_confirmation_desc: Your email is not yet confirmed. You can continue or confirm your email.
email_not_confirmed_message: Your account has been created but your email address is not yet confirmed. You can continue to use the site or confirm your email for optimal security.
welcome_jellyfin_user_desc: Create your account in the application by providing your personal information.
password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
account_creation_info: Your account will be created and you can sign in immediately.
jellyfin_welcome_desc: Your Jellyfin account has been successfully synchronized.
add_personal_email_desc: For a better experience, we recommend adding your personal email in your profile settings.
welcome_later_message: Welcome! You can add your email later in your settings.
email_update_note: You can always modify this information later in your profile settings.
jellyfin_user_created_and_logged_in: Account created and logged in successfully!
jellyfin_login_info: Sign in with your Jellyfin credentials. If you don't have an account in the application, one will be created automatically.
password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters long
password_requirements: Must contain uppercase, lowercase and number
choose_login_method_desc: Sign in with your email or Jellyfin credentials
